item.title: Ox-hugo export all roam to Hugo
item.description: tags Emacs Org-mode Org-roam Export all org-roam files to Hugo markdown (this might take some time) From: jethrokuan/dots (defun benmezger/org-roam-export-all () "Re-exports all Org-roam files to Hugo markdown." (interactive) (dolist (f (org-roam--list-all-files)) (with-current-buffer (find-file f) (when (s-contains? "SETUPFILE" (buffer-string)) (org-hugo-export-wim-to-md))))) Adding an empty #+SETUPFILE: forces benmezger/org-roam-export-all to export the file.
